item.title: Getting PubMed metadata with RISmed directly into RStudio
item.description: What is this post about? Introduction - what were the problems I faced? RISmed package How to use RISmed? What is this post about? For my masterâ€™s thesis (blogpost following - stay tuned ðŸ˜Ž) I came at a point where I was interested in having a closer look at publication meta data (e.g.Â publications per year) PubMed usually does provide this service when you execute your search, for some reason it failed for my query
